alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 10:18PM CDT until March 23 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Haskell County in west central Texas... Northwestern Throckmorton County in west central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1018 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sagerton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Haskell around 1035 PM CDT. Weinert and Irby around 1045 PM CDT. Millers Creek Reservoir around 1100 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line, Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line and The Intersection Of Us-380 And Highway 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
